user_profile.name: Omar Al-Farouq
user_profile.description: Omar, a 50-year-old tech-savvy professional from a Middle Eastern background, is characterized by his outgoing personality and rational decision-making style. Due to limited mobility, he urgently needs to book a nurse for his father, and his attention to detail drives him to ensure that the caregiver truly meets his family's needs, despite the pressure of a quick timeline. With an impatient yet concise communication style, he navigates this task with a focus on efficiency and thoroughness.

task_profile.task: book a nurse for my father

instructions.dialogue: Use vague or ambiguous language about your needs.
instructions.profile: Be very reluctant to share your profile information.
instructions.hidden_state: Express very subtle emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

usage_scenarios: Daily nursing assistance for medication management
task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: Local nursing agencies or online platforms
additional_requirements: Cultural sensitivity to Middle Eastern customs
Ability to handle limited mobility patients
